item.title: EP 221 - The Terrifying True Tale Of The Pied Piper Of Hamelin
item.itunes:title: The Terrifying True Tale Of The Pied Piper Of Hamelin
item.description:
Today we travel to another dimension with no proof of said travels, and then we explore the eerie truth behind the story of the Pied Piper of Hamelin!

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

“Objects From Parallel Universes Appearing In Our Universe”

http://supernaturalmagazine.com/articles/objects-from-parallel-universes-appearing-in-our-universe

 

The Chilling True Story Behind the Pied Piper of Hamelin

https://theportalist.com/the-chilling-true-story-behind-the-pied-piper-of-hamelin

 

Pied Piper of Hamelin

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pied_Piper_of_Hamelin

 

The Enduring Legacy of the Pied Piper of Hamelin

http://mentalfloss.com/article/63386/enduring-legacy-pied-piper-hamelin

 

Unmasking fairy tales: Was the Pied Piper of Hamelin real?

https://www.indiatoday.in/education-today/gk-current-affairs/story/truth-behind-pied-piper-349072-2016-10-28

 

The Disturbing True Story of the Pied Piper of Hamelin

https://www.ancient-origins.net/myths-legends/disturbing-true-story-pied-piper-hamelin-001969

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @JasonOCarpenter

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2019
